name: Luigi Ware Inc
description:
Untitled Game Jam #70

Hosted by Thedrdevin, LexLoco · #UntitledGameJam

Theme: One Button

Luigi is new to the video game biz, and the newbie minigame pro is cookin' up some insane party games on PC/Web/Android. The 3 silly minigames from Luigi Ware, Inc play wonderfully on multiple platforms, starring Luigi's awesome game development skills!
